===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[time]] (to do something); synonym for {{zh-l|工夫}}
#: {{zh-x|我 沒{méi}有 功夫{fu}。|I have no '''time'''. (I am busy)}}
#: {{zh-x|一會兒{r} 功夫{fu} 他 就 爬 上 了 一个 大 樹。|He climbed up a tall tree in no '''time'''}}
# [[efforts]] (devoted to a task)
#: {{zh-x|要 花 很 大 的 功夫{fu} 才 行。|It won't work unless one expends great '''effort'''.}}
# [[accomplishments]], [[achievement]]
# [[skill]]; [[art]]; [[workmanship]] (especially Chinese martial arts)
#: {{zh-x|那 個 演員 念 臺詞 的 功夫{fu} 不錯。|That actor's '''skill''' at reading his lines is not too shabby.}}
# [[kung fu]] ([[w:Chinese_martial_arts|Chinese Martial art]])
#: {{zh-x|這 是 ^中國 ^少林 功夫{fu} 首次 在 ^雅典 登 臺 亮相。|This was the first time that Chinese [[w:Shaolin|Shaolin]] '''kung fu''' was put on display in [[Athens]], Greece.}}

====Synonyms====
* {{zh-l|武術}} (Chinese martial art, [[wushu]])
* {{zh-l|工夫}}

====Usage notes====
* Originally, ''kung fu'' referred to any skill learned through great effort. Used by the Occident to refer to Chinese martial arts ({{zh-l|武術}}), ''kung fu'' is now used by Chinese to also refer to martial arts, but only since the late twentieth century.
